item.title: Niall Horan and Hailee Steinfeld: Definitely Dating!
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesFor several weeks now, we’ve been hearing rumors about the possibility of Niall Horan and Hailee Steinfeld dating. Both parties …

Niall Horan and Hailee Steinfeld: Definitely Dating! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

For several weeks now, we’ve been hearing rumors about the possibility of Niall Horan and Hailee Steinfeld dating.

Both parties denied the rumors, claiming that they’re nothing more than close friends.

Now, however, those who know the couple best are speaking out on their relationship, and it seems there’s no doubt that the singers are far more than just platonic besties.

"It’s true that Hailee and Niall are dating, but at this point it’s still pretty casual," a source close to both parties tells E! News.

Fans have suspected that the photogenic stars are hooking up since back in February.

At the time, the couple attempted to spend a low-key weekend together in Vegas, but the tabloid media was quick to catch on.

Niall and Hailee were spotted taking in a Backstreet Boys concert, and fans social media immediately began buzzing with dating rumors.

In December, Niall added fuel to the fire by gushing about Hailee on Instagram:

"Happy birthday to the loveliest person on the planet and one of my best friends @haileesteinfeld," he wrote.

A few days ago, she returned the favor by posting a photo of herself wearing a t-shirt from Horan’s recent world tour.

Needless to say, the public didn’t really need today’s confirmation to led them to the conclusion that Niall and Hailee are more than just friends.

Niall and Hailee were reportedly both single when they started spending a lot of time together several months ago, but their dating histories have intersected in interesting ways.

Back in 2017, it was rumored that Hailee was hooking up with Justin Bieber.

Around that same time, reports about Niall and Selena Gomez were everywhere on social media.

So we’re guessing Niall and Hailee had no trouble coming up with topics of conversation during their first date.

As for how they spend their time these days, we’re guessing they repeatedly watch True Grit and discuss the fact that Hailee seriously deserved an Oscar for that performance.

For most people, stealing every scene in a Coen brothers movie would be the peak, but fortunately, both Hailee and Niall have avoided the curse of the child star.

Niall Horan and Hailee Steinfeld: Definitely Dating! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Niall Horan and James Corden Parody “Pony,” Win Halloween
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesFor the past several years, Heidi Klum has been the clear winner of Halloween. There’s really no debating this fact. …

Niall Horan and James Corden Parody “Pony,” Win Halloween was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

For the past several years, Heidi Klum has been the clear winner of Halloween.

There’s really no debating this fact. Just consider these Heidi Klum costumes.

But the supermodel’s time may have passed, as Niall Horan and James Corden made quite the effort on Wednesday night to grab the Halloween victor title from Klum.

They did so via a costume-themed spot of Ginuwine’s "Pony."

Simply put, it was amazing.

The comedian and the One Direction singer titled their music video “Candy,” singing all about trick or treating on October 31.

In the footage – which we’ve featured above – The Late Late Show host and the very handsome artist they sang about candy. In a very sexual manner.

"When you break me off a Kit Kat, I’m going to make your Tootsie Pop," Horan crooned, for example.

And the stars also dressed the part, with rocking a number of costumes, from a pea in a pod… Dracula… to a ghost… to a cow… to a pirate. 

”I’m just a Batman, looking for some Pop Rocks, something that’s sweet inside, you look like the right fun size,” sang Corden at one point.

We may never look at candy or superheroes the same way ever again.

Again, you can check out this Late Late Show treat at the outset of this article.

And you can compare it to the original "Pony" video below. We know which one we’ll be watching again and again…

As for his actual appearance as a guest on the late-night talk show, Horan refused to divulge which One Direction member he likes the least during the segment "Spill Your Guts Or Fill Your Guts."

He was therefore forced to drink a salmon smoothie.

Later, however, when asked to choose whether he would rather spend his last night on earth with Selena Gomez or Ellie Goulding, Horan picked the latter.

Interesting!

Horan also debuted his solo track “This Town" on the program.

But it was overshadowed by "Candy." Whuch we totally need to go view again. Please excuse us.

Niall Horan and James Corden Parody “Pony,” Win Halloween was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Niall Horan SLAMS Fan Who Took Picture Of Him
item.dc:creator: pauldailly
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesNiall Horan is not impressed with a fan who decided to take pictures of him while he slept on a …

Niall Horan SLAMS Fan Who Took Picture Of Him was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Niall Horan is not impressed with a fan who decided to take pictures of him while he slept on a plane. 

The One Direction singer previously made it clear to the fan that he didn’t want to take pictures. 

Add in the fact that Niall was sick, you can understand why he would want to just rest and have the flight be over. 

How would you feel if someone took a picture of you while you were sleeping?

The fan crossed a line. 

Everyone is entitled to privacy. 

Horan is super popular, so he must get picture requests every single day of his life. 

All he wanted was to take a break, but one fan took it upon herself to take a picture anyway. 

She then hit social media boasting about her time in Europe and the fact that she met Niall on her plane. 

She wrote, “And to sum up the PERFECT European adventure, I sat directly next to Niall from One Direction for 9 hours on my flight home from London last night."

"He was sick and asked for no selfies, but here is a pic I snapped while he was sleeping lol he was so friendly!”

“Talked about Ireland LSE, lolla, and more. Not a British duke… But an Irish Popstar will do. thanks for treating me so well Europe!”

Niall was quick to speak out after the fan posted the picture. 

“I think this sh*t is unreal. I mean if you can’t sleep on a plane without people taking photos of you, what can u do?”

It’s not very often that celebrities blast fans like this, but it’s clear that this was only the first of many similar instances for the One Direction star. 

What do you think about Niall’s response?

Hit the comments below!

13 HOT Niall Horan Photos

Niall Horan SLAMS Fan Who Took Picture Of Him was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Selena Gomez: About to Have Niall Horan’s Baby?!?
item.dc:creator: Naomi Lane
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesSelena Gomez wants a baby, but she doesn’t want a man. However, she does need some sperm to make said …

Selena Gomez: About to Have Niall Horan’s Baby?!? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Selena Gomez wants a baby, but she doesn’t want a man.

However, she does need some sperm to make said baby and she wants it to come from Niall Horan, according to Inquisitr.

Reports surfaced in early December of the two hanging out, and making out, but apparently Selena was just sussing him out to determine if he’s biological dad material.

Selena denied any romantic involvement between the two, claiming that they were just friends.

"Oh my god. No," she said when asked if they were an item. "I love him, I always have. He’s amazing."

Did you hear that? She called him "amazing."

Clearly, that translates to "I want my baby to have your DNA! (But not necessarily your love and emotional support.)"

The site reports that Selena is jumping on the trend of women turning to in-vitro fertilization to have babies without the complication of a pesky relationship.

“Selena knows with her celebrity and past relationships that it will be hard to lock down a man," a source told HollywoodLife. "There is just too much that goes with it."

"The paparazzi, the constant travel and distance with careers and everything in between that causes a struggle," continued the source. "Regardless of how her future relationships go, she will be a mother. She would love that experience more than anything.” 

Right. And at the ripe old age of 23, she’d better hop to it and give Niall a cup.

We can’t imagine this story has any merit whatsoever, but we don’t deny that a Selena-Niall baby would be cute as a button.

17 Surprising Selena Gomez Facts

Selena Gomez: About to Have Niall Horan’s Baby?!? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
